entries.text: 安妮特·梅森被魔鬼附身。
安妮特將古老的法術傳授給你。

the coven of Keziah holds the world in its grasp.

entries.masculine_text: #name#冒險開始時帶有1個線索(從供應堆拿取)。
entries.feminine_text: #name#冒險開始時帶有1個線索(從供應堆拿取)。
entries.nonbinary_text: #name#冒險開始時帶有1個線索(從供應堆拿取)。

entries.text: 你傾聽了伊塔卡的敘述。

supplies.name: 黏液團
supplies.description: A sticky goop you found in a subterranean swamp.

supplies.name: 神秘權杖
supplies.description: 你在王座大廳裡找到的神祕權杖。

supplies.name: 埃茲特里之鑰
supplies.description: 埃茲特里之鑰。

supplies.name: 配給
supplies.description: 一人份的乾糧和水。出行必備。

supplies.name: 汽油
supplies.description: 足夠一輛車跑一趟長途了。

supplies.name: 藥品
supplies.description: 治病，消除感染，解毒。

supplies.name: 掛墜
supplies.description: 沒甚麼用，但美好的回憶能給遠離家鄉的遊子帶來安慰。

supplies.name: 水壺
supplies.description: 可以在小溪和河邊盛水。

supplies.name: 指南針
supplies.description: 在你迷失方向而絕望時，它能夠指引你。

supplies.name: 毛毯
supplies.description: 好在夜裡保暖。

supplies.name: 雙筒望遠鏡
supplies.description: 幫助你看到更遠的地方。

supplies.name: 粉筆
supplies.description: 用來在粗糙的石面寫字。

supplies.name: 鶴嘴鋤
supplies.description: 用來敲裂岩石的表面。

supplies.name: 摺疊小刀
supplies.description: 這東西太小，不能用作一把可靠的武器，但易於藏匿。

supplies.name: 火把
supplies.description: 可以照亮昏暗的區域，或點燃燭臺。

supplies.name: 繩索
supplies.description: 幾圈又長又結實的繩索，對於攀爬和岩洞探險來說至關重要。

supplies.name: 地圖
supplies.description: 現在地圖上還沒作標記，但隨著時間推移，你或許能夠描繪出周邊的環境。

entries.text: you are the custodian of Ithaqua's knowledge.
you have discovered the fate of Dr. Nadelmann's students.
you have enoughe evidence to clear Dr. Nadelmann.
the Sarcee are hunting you down.
you know that the Wendigo still roams the North Hanninah valley.
個體代號8L-08吞噬了整個宇宙。
the cell meddled in Abarran’s affairs.
狂歡節期間許多平民被獻祭給奈達斯奎。
太陽將奈達斯奎逐回深海。
the Constellation was lost to the depths.
the investigators cleaned out the house.
the investigators convinced Isamara to participate in the heist.
the investigators impersonated a high roller.
the investigators need time to rest.
the investigators obtained an employee uniform.

調查員逃離了犯罪現場。
謀殺仍在繼續，尚未解決。
the ritual at sea was completed.
the ritual at sea was halted.
狼人被摧毀且詛咒被移除。
狼人逃離且你身負詛咒。
你發現了伊扎法拉的計劃。
兄弟會的密謀順利無阻。
你加入了伊扎法拉的勢力。
you abandoned the people of Eastwick.
you fended off an alien entity.
you slaughtered the people of Eastwick.
all is quiet at Rue d'Auseil… for now.
the investigators avenged the House of Usher.
the House of Usher has fallen.
加弗瑞拉·米兹拉克已死亡。
調查員正在追查加弗瑞拉。
調查員正在追查傑羅姆。

entries.text: 哈珀特工的任務已完成。
哈珀特工的任務已完成……但代價是什麼呢？
扎多克·艾倫要你血債血償。
布里安·伯納姆要你血債血償。
調查員逃出伊哈·恩斯雷。

伊哈·恩斯雷認可你為正統的看守人。
